purpleculture_info:
(Simplified: 胧)
Pictophonetic: 龍 indicates the sound; 月 (moon) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿰ Left to right
    • 月 [ yuè ] moon; month
    • 龍 [ lóng ] dragon; symbol of the emperor
Kanshudo_mnemonic: a dragon (龍) month (⺝) is hazy
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: The dragon likes to get out at night time under a hazy moon so that he's not seen as easily and can fly in peace.
humanum_full_description_en:
From " moon " to " dragon " sound. " Oro " is a twilight appearance. Such as the Eastern Han Huan Tan "New Theory. "Warcraft": "The sky is full of nights, not as good as the obscure moon." "Selected Works. Pan Anren "Autumn Xing Fu": "The moon is hazy to contain light, and the dew is clear to condense cold."

" Oro " also means dim. For example, Xia Hou Zhan in the Western Jin Dynasty "Autumn Keai Fu": "The moon is covered with clouds, and the stars are obscured without light." Qing Dynasty Zhu Yizun "Summer Yingtai Shizhi Chronicle": "In the obscure deep trees, suddenly reveal nine Branch lights."

"Hazy" is often used together to indicate the appearance of a dim moon. "Shuowen Xinfu": "Obscure, also hazy." As in the Northern Song Dynasty Liuyong (Xuanqing): "The waning moon is hazy, the small banquet is dim, and the return is light and cold." The extension refers to vagueness. For example, Wang Changling of the Tang Dynasty "Xigong Chunyuan": "Hold the clouds obliquely and see the moon in the depth, and the misty trees hide the sun." "Journey to the West" Chapter 8: "Only killing is indifferent, the stars are shining; the fog is foggy, the sky is hazy. "See " Meng ".
humanum_short_description_en: From " moon " to " dragon " sound. " Oro " is a twilight appearance. "Hazy" is used together to indicate the appearance of a dim moon, and by extension, it means blurring.
humanum_full_description:
從「月」，「龍」聲。「朧」是微明貌。如東漢桓譚《新論．兵術》：「是以列宿滿天，不及朧月。」《文選．潘安仁〈秋興賦〉》：「月朣朧以含光兮，露淒清以凝冷。」

　　「朧」也表示暗淡。如西晉夏侯湛〈秋可哀賦〉：「月翳翳以隱雲，星朧朧而沒光。」清代朱彝尊〈夏日瀛臺侍直紀事〉：「朧朧深樹裏，忽露九枝燈。」

　　「朦朧」經常連用，表示月色昏暗之貌。《說文新附》：「朧，朦朧也。」如北宋柳永〈宣清〉：「殘月朦朧，小宴闌珊，歸來輕寒凜凜。」引申指模糊不清。如唐代王昌齡〈西宮春怨〉：「斜抱雲和深見月，朦朧樹色隱昭陽。」《西游記》第8回：「只殺得昏漠漠，星辰燦爛；霧騰騰，天地朦朧。」參見「朦」。
humanum_short_description: 從「月」，「龍」聲。「朧」是微明貌。「朦朧」連用表示月色昏暗之貌，引申指模糊不清。

(Simplified: 胧)
Pictophonetic: 龍 indicates the sound; 月 (moon) conveys the meaning.
Kanshudo mnemonic:a dragon (龍) month (⺝) is hazy
Meaning: hazy
Hanzi: 胧
Story: The dragon likes to get out at night time under a hazy moon so that he's not seen as easily and can fly in peace.
Kind: traditional

從「 月 」，「 龍 」聲。「 朧 」是微明貌。如東漢桓譚《新論．兵術》：「是以列宿滿天，不及朧月。」《文選．潘安仁〈秋興賦〉》：「月朣朧以含光兮，露淒清以凝冷。」 「 朧 」也表示暗淡。如西晉夏侯湛〈秋可哀賦〉：「月翳翳以隱雲，星朧朧而沒光。」清代朱彝尊〈夏日瀛臺侍直紀事〉：「朧朧深樹裏，忽露九枝燈。」 「朦朧」經常連用，表示月色昏暗之貌。《說文新附》：「朧，朦朧也。」如北宋柳永〈宣清〉：「殘月朦朧，小宴闌珊，歸來輕寒凜凜。」引申指模糊不清。如唐代王昌齡〈西宮春怨〉：「斜抱雲和深見月，朦朧樹色隱昭陽。」《西游記》第8回：「只殺得昏漠漠，星辰燦爛；霧騰騰，天地朦朧。」參見「 朦 」。
From " moon" to " dragon" sound. " Oro" is a twilight appearance. Such as the Eastern Han Huan Tan "New Theory. "Warcraft": "The sky is full of nights, not as good as the obscure moon." "Selected Works. Pan Anren "Autumn Xing Fu": "The moon is hazy to contain light, and the dew is clear to condense cold." " Oro" also means dim. For example, Xia Hou Zhan in the Western Jin Dynasty "Autumn Keai Fu": "The moon is covered with clouds, and the stars are obscured without light." Qing Dynasty Zhu Yizun "Summer Yingtai Shizhi Chronicle": "In the obscure deep trees, suddenly reveal nine Branch lights." "Hazy" is often used together to indicate the appearance of a dim moon. "Shuowen Xinfu": "Obscure, also hazy." As in the Northern Song Dynasty Liuyong (Xuanqing): "The waning moon is hazy, the small banquet is dim, and the return is light and cold." The extension refers to vagueness. For example, Wang Changling of the Tang Dynasty "Xigong Chunyuan": "Hold the clouds obliquely and see the moon in the depth, and the misty trees hide the sun." "Journey to the West" Chapter 8: "Only killing is indifferent, the stars are shining; the fog is foggy, the sky is hazy. "See " Meng".

朧字的基本解释

朧
lóng
见“胧”。

朧字的汉语字典释义

[①]［lóng］
［《廣韻》盧紅切，平東，來。］
“胧1”的繁体字。
(1)月明貌；微明貌。参见“朧月”、“朧明”、“朧朧”。
(2)昏暗貌。参见“朧朧”。
[②]［lǒng］
［《集韻》魯孔切，上蕫，來。］
“胧2”的繁体字。
见“朧2腫”。

朧字的康熙字典解释

【辰集上】【月字部】　朧； 康熙笔画：20； 页码：页507第04
【廣韻】盧紅切【集韻】【韻會】盧東切，?音籠。【說文】朦朧也。　又【類篇】朣朧，月初出。詳朣字註。

朧字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
朧字的起名意思

暂无。

(2) Dim appearance. See "Obscure".
